GoogleAuthenticator.DisabledInfo: Google Authenticator is currently disabled. Please click below to activate Google Authenticator for your account.
GoogleAuthenticator.SecretGenerated: A new secret has been generated. Please rescan the QR-Code or update the secret in Google Authenticator App.
GoogleAuthenticator.ActivityActivated: has activated secure login using Google Authenticator
GoogleAuthenticator.ActivityDisabled: has disabled secure login using Google Authenticator
GoogleAuthenticator.QRCodeDescription: Scan this QR-Code with the Google Authenticator App on your mobile.
GoogleAuthenticator.AuthCodeNewDescription: Please type in the auth code, after updating your Google Authenticator app with the new secret.
GoogleAuthenticator.NewSecretSaved: Your new Google Authenticator secret has been saved.
GoogleAuthenticator.Title: Title
GoogleAuthenticator.TitleDescription: Title to display in your Google Authenticator app.
GoogleAuthenticator.DescriptionDescription: Description to display in your Google Authenticator app.
GoogleAuthenticator.Disabled: Google Authenticator support for this account has been disabled
GoogleAuthenticator.AuthCodeRequired: Please type in the auth code from your Google Authenticator App.
GoogleAuthenticator.LoginPluginDisabled: Matomo Login plugin has been disabled automatically, as it conflicts with Google Authenticator. In order to switch back to default Login (without Google Authenticator), please disable Google Authenticator plugin.
